title: Hands-On-Exercise-00: Working with tidyverse
text:
Getting started
Loading tidyverse onto r environment by using the code chunk below.

pacman::p_load(tidyverse)


The downloaded binary packages are in
    /var/folders/wv/lb5xz_ns1kq9cz1cgz2ltd040000gn/T//Rtmpt7Uaz6/downloaded_packages

title: Hands-On-Exercise-00: Working with tidyverse
text: Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see https://quarto.org.

title: Hands-On-Exercise-00: Working with tidyverse
text:
Running Code
When you click the Render button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

1 + 1

[1] 2


You can add options to executable code like this


[1] 4


The echo: false option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).

title: Hands-On-Exercise-00: Working with tidyverse
text:
Getting started
Loading tidyverse onto r environment by using the code chunk below.

pacman::p_load(tidyverse)

Importing data

realis_csv <- read_csv("data/REALIS2019.csv")


popdata_fat <- read.csv("data/PopData2019_fat.csv")

Pivoting data

popdata_long <- popdata_fat %>%
  pivot_longer(c(3:21),
               names_to = "Age Group",
               values_to = "Population")


write_rds(popdata_long, "rds/popdata_long.rds")

working with dplyr

realis2019_selected <- realis_csv %>%
  select('Project Name',
         'Transacted Price ($)',
         'Type of Sale',
         'Unit Price ($ psm)',
         'Property Type')
realis2019_selected

# A tibble: 19,515 × 5
   `Project Name`     `Transacted Price ($)` `Type of Sale` `Unit Price ($ psm)`
   <chr>                               <dbl> <chr>                         <dbl>
 1 PEIRCE VIEW                        840000 Resale                         7434
 2 FLORIDA PARK                      3040000 Resale                         9737
 3 BULLION PARK                       860000 Resale                        11467
 4 CASTLE GREEN                      1000000 Resale                         9346
 5 HAPPY ESTATE                      7000000 Resale                        10183
 6 TEACHER'S HOUSING…                2880000 Resale                        12659
 7 THE PANORAMA                      1510000 Resale                        16064
 8 THE PANORAMA                       710000 Resale                        16905
 9 CHIP THYE GARDEN                  2800000 Resale                        13500
10 TEACHER'S HOUSING…                2300000 Resale                         9935
# ℹ 19,505 more rows
# ℹ 1 more variable: `Property Type` <chr>



realis2019_filtered <- realis2019_selected %>%
  filter('Property Type' == "Condominium" |
  'Property Type' == "Apartment") %>%
  filter('Type of Sale' == "New Sale") %>%
  filter('Unit Price ($ psm)' <= 13000)

title: Hands-On-Exercise-00: Working with tidyverse
text:
Getting started
Loading tidyverse onto r environment by using the code chunk below.

pacman::p_load(tidyverse)

Importing data

realis_csv <- read_csv("data/REALIS2019.csv")


popdata_fat <- read.csv("data/PopData2019_fat.csv")

Pivoting data

popdata_long <- popdata_fat %>%
  pivot_longer(c(3:21),
               names_to = "Age Group",
               values_to = "Population")


write_rds(popdata_long, "rds/popdata_long.rds")

working with dplyr

realis2019_selected <- realis_csv %>%
  select('Project Name',
         'Transacted Price ($)',
         'Type of Sale',
         'Unit Price ($ psm)',
         'Property Type')
realis2019_selected

# A tibble: 19,515 × 5
   `Project Name`     `Transacted Price ($)` `Type of Sale` `Unit Price ($ psm)`
   <chr>                               <dbl> <chr>                         <dbl>
 1 PEIRCE VIEW                        840000 Resale                         7434
 2 FLORIDA PARK                      3040000 Resale                         9737
 3 BULLION PARK                       860000 Resale                        11467
 4 CASTLE GREEN                      1000000 Resale                         9346
 5 HAPPY ESTATE                      7000000 Resale                        10183
 6 TEACHER'S HOUSING…                2880000 Resale                        12659
 7 THE PANORAMA                      1510000 Resale                        16064
 8 THE PANORAMA                       710000 Resale                        16905
 9 CHIP THYE GARDEN                  2800000 Resale                        13500
10 TEACHER'S HOUSING…                2300000 Resale                         9935
# ℹ 19,505 more rows
# ℹ 1 more variable: `Property Type` <chr>



realis2019_filtered <- realis2019_selected %>%
  filter('Property Type' == "Condominium" |
  'Property Type' == "Apartment") %>%
  filter('Type of Sale' == "New Sale") %>%
  filter('Unit Price ($ psm)' <= 13000)
